DataElement.preferredName: Blood Collection Tube Buffy Coat Frozen Date and Time
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The date or date and time the middle layer of an anticoagulated blood specimen was immobilized by severe cold.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Blood Collection Tube Buffy Coat Frozen
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A test tube, capillary tube, or other tube designed for the collection of blood._The middle layer of an anticoagulated blood specimen following separation by centrifugation. It contains most of the white blood cells and platelets._The act or event which causes the transition from a liquid to solid matter phase.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A test tube, capillary tube, or other tube designed for the collection of blood.

Concepts.definition: A test tube, capillary tube, or other tube designed for the collection of blood.

Property.preferredDefinition: The middle layer of an anticoagulated blood specimen following separation by centrifugation. It contains most of the white blood cells and platelets.:The act or event which causes the transition from a liquid to solid matter phase.

Concepts.definition: The middle layer of an anticoagulated blood specimen following separation by centrifugation. It contains most of the white blood cells and platelets.
The act or event which causes the transition from a liquid to solid matter phase when the temperature is lowered.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: attributes of a patient's laboratory sample, including the source, condition, and fixative.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date or date and time that an event has happened or will happen.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.
